Articles.Content: What do you think of mars direct I like the idea personally. I think it is the only way we can get to mars in the near term with out ludicrously expensive in orbit assembly.

What do you think of mars direct I like the idea personally. I think it is the only way we can get to mars in the near term with out ludicrously expensive in orbit assembly.

I believe that while it is completely viable, the figures are a little optimistic.

I would also like more detail on the return trip
